```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(lubridate)
library(pbapply)
```

```{r}
combine <- read.csv(file = 'combine.csv')
```

```{r}
combine=combine %>% 
  select(-X)
```

```{r}
combine$month=month(ymd(combine$date))
```
```{r}
combine$year=year(ymd(combine$date))
```

```{r}
combinerecent = combine[combine$year>=1999,]
```


```{r}
bycusip <- combinerecent %>% 
  group_by(CUSIP, year,month) %>% 
  nest()
```

```{r}
model <- function(df) {
  lm(RETX ~ sprtrn, data = df)
}
```

```{r}
bycusipticker1 <- bycusip[bycusip$CUSIP==74835610,]
```

```{r}
bycusipyear1 <- bycusip[bycusip$year==1999,]
```



```{r}
bycusip <- bycusip %>% 
  mutate(model = map(data, model)) 
```
